ruleBookInfo.author:
@css::containsOwn(小说作者)@text<js>
result.replace('小说作者：','')</js>
ruleBookInfo.kind: @css::containsOwn(文库分类) :containsOwn(文章状态) :containsOwn(作品Tags)@text<js>String(result).replace(/文库分类：|文章状态：|作品Tags：|\[|\]/g,'').replace(/\s+/g,',')</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: @css:[valign=middle][align=center] b@text

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##本文来自\s轻小说文库\(http:\/\/www\.wenku8\.com\)|最新最全的日本动漫轻小说\s轻小说文库\(http:\/\/www\.wenku8\.com\) 为你一网打尽！

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList: <js>org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).select(".grid td>div").toArray().map(bk=>{var n=bk.select("b>a").text();var data=bk.select("p:eq(1)").text().match(/作者:([^\/]*)/);var a=data?data[1]:"";var data2=String(bk.select("p:eq(1)").text()).match(/\/分类:(.*)/);var data3=String(bk.select("p:eq(2)").text()).split("/");var data4=String(bk.select("p:eq(3)>span").text()).replace(/\s/,',');var k=(data2?data2[1]:"").concat(",").concat(data3?(data3[2]?data3[2]:""):"").concat(",").concat(data4?data4:"");var w=data3?((data3[1]?data3[1]:"").replace('字数:','')):"";var l=data3?((data3[0]?data3[0]:"").replace('更新:','')):"";var i=bk.select("p:eq(4)").html().replace('简介:','');var c=bk.select("img").attr("src");var u=bk.select("b>a").attr("href");return {name:n,author:a,kind:k,word:w,last:l,intro:i,cover:c,url:u};})</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList: <js>org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).select(".grid td>div").toArray().map(bk=>{var n=bk.select("b>a").text();var data=bk.select("p:eq(1)").text().match(/作者:([^\/]*)/);var a=data?data[1]:"";var data2=String(bk.select("p:eq(1)").text()).match(/\/分类:(.*)/);var data3=String(bk.select("p:eq(2)").text()).split("/");var data4=String(bk.select("p:eq(3)>span").text()).replace(/\s/,',');var k=(data2?data2[1]:"").concat(",").concat(data3?(data3[2]?data3[2]:""):"").concat(",").concat(data4?data4:"");var w=data3?((data3[1]?data3[1]:"").replace('字数:','')):"";var l=data3?((data3[0]?data3[0]:"").replace('更新:','')):"";var i=bk.select("p:eq(4)").html().replace('简介:','');var c=bk.select("img").attr("src");var u=bk.select("b>a").attr("href");return {name:n,author:a,kind:k,word:w,last:l,intro:i,cover:c,url:u};})</js>
ruleSearch.name: name
